general.browseNewsForSpecificCountry: Browse news from a specific country
general.difficulty: The thing that slowed me down the most was Material UI, I'm into styled components too much. MUI is a great library with very good documentation. However, if I had to make a choice now, I'd probably go with a Headless UI style library.
general.fun: I had the most fun creating the project. For me, the end of March does not mean the end of this project, because I will want to use it as a sandbox. I will definitely start with getting into SSR and Next.js
